ptII/vendors/jhdl/README.txt
$Id$
This directory contains the JHDL jar file from http://www.jhdl.org
The current version is 
http://www.jhdl.org/release-latest/release/0_3_4/JHDL_0_3_4.jar

To run it use:
cxh@maury 3% java -classpath vendors/jhdl/JHDL_0_3_4.jar byucc.jhdl.Version
JHDL RELEASE 0.3.4
Created May 18, 2001
cxh@maury 4%
